bibl.title: The Footwear from Kellis, a Roman Period Village in the Dakhleh Oasis.
bibl.note: 1. Introduction. - 2. The footwear [about 107 identifiable items from all areas of the site]. - 3. Conclusions. - 4. Amendments to 'Late Antique Household Textiles from Kellis'.

bibl.title: assisted by Elisabeth Ehler, Dress Accessories of the 1st Millennium AD from Egypt. Proceedings of the 6th Conference of the Research Group 'Textiles from the Nile Valley', Antwerp, 2-3 October 2009.
